pr_title: [BEAM-10682] Add workflow to run Java tests on Linux/Windows/Mac

timeline.bodyText: Can you create a Jira issue per failing test suite as subtasks of BEAM-10683 please? Having a list of failing test suites will be easier for tracking and hopefully encourage people to chip away at it instead of one large issue for them all.
timeline.author: tysonjh

replies.bodyText: Sure. I created 26 subtasks. Every failing test or testing class have link to relevant JIRA issue now.
replies.author: TobKed

timeline.message: fixup! Seperate jiras for failing tests
